Package com.example.midterm_manelespinosa.model.accounts

Class BasicAccount

java.lang.Object
com.example.midterm_manelespinosa.model.accounts.BasicAccount
Direct Known Subclasses:
CheckingAccount, CreditCard, SavingsAccount, StudentCheckingAccount
@Entity public abstract class BasicAccount extends Object
Basic account abstract class is an entity that contains the attributes that all the accounts will have in common. It is the super class of the other accounts classes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BasicAccount()
    Constructor of the class with all the default values when creating an account from the controller routes.Penalty fee has to be equal to 40, the creation date is the moment and the first update date is the same.
    BasicAccount(LocalDateTime creationDate, AccountHolder primaryOwner, AccountHolder secondaryOwner, String secretKey, Money balance)
    Overload of the preious contructor but including the second owner.
    BasicAccount(LocalDateTime creationDate, AccountHolder primaryOwner, String secretKey, Money balance)
    Constructor without the second owner given than is optional.

    • BasicAccount

      public BasicAccount()
      Constructor of the class with all the default values when creating an account from the controller routes.Penalty fee has to be equal to 40, the creation date is the moment and the first update date is the same.

    • BasicAccount

      public BasicAccount(@NotNull LocalDateTime creationDate, @NotNull AccountHolder primaryOwner, @NotNull String secretKey, @NotNull Money balance)
      Constructor without the second owner given than is optional. It has the rest of parameters with the default values mentioned and some other parameters free of choice in order to create samples to test. The balance is initialized through the setter to control the entrance.
